site.title: OumaShu - Tools Directory
site.description: Curated hub for productivity tools. All-in-one entry for free online apps and utilities.

learn-languages_desc: AI conversation practice and PDF Q&A training, complete solution for improving foreign language skills
subtitle-screenshot_desc: Celebrity background subtitle screenshot generator, quickly create interesting subtitle meme images with bilingual mode support
media-trim_desc: Online video to audio converter, supports audio trimming and format conversion
mbti-test_desc: Professional MBTI personality type test with 68 questions for in-depth analysis of your personality traits and behavior patterns
video2gif_desc: Online video to GIF converter, supports multiple video formats, quickly generate high-quality GIF animations
pic-press_desc: Free online batch image compression tool, supports JPG, PNG, WebP formats, local processing protects privacy
pansou_desc: High-performance cloud storage search API service, supports TG channel and plugin search, multi-channel concurrent search with smart sorting
text-grove_desc: Full-featured text processing toolkit, includes word count, text deduplication, word frequency statistics, simplified/traditional conversion, text formatting, local processing protects privacy
markdown_desc: Online Markdown editor with live preview and multi-format export (PDF, HTML, Word, JPG, PNG)
p2p-transfer_desc: Secure end-to-end file and text transfer tool, data does not go through server, protects privacy
work-whale_desc: Web-based novel reader disguised as Microsoft Word interface, perfectly blends into office environment for stress-free reading
stealth-novel_desc: Windows desktop hidden novel reader, supports taskbar title display and disguised popup mode, essential tool for office reading
bedmate_desc: Healthy sleep partner platform, helps users find like-minded sleep companions to improve sleep quality
screen-flow_desc: Free online screen recording tool, supports screen recording, webcam recording, audio recording, no software installation required
cuisine-chat_desc: Free online temporary chat tool, no registration required, instant creation, supports real-time messaging and file sharing with privacy protection
fmhy_desc: Free Media Heck Yeah - The largest collection of free resources on the internet
axutongxue_desc: Axu's Storage Room - Curated learning resources, software tools, and course materials collection
wotaku_desc: Otaku Index - Anime, manga, games and other otaku culture resource navigation
feisoo_desc: Feishu Document Search Tool - Quickly search and discover Feishu document resources
pornhub-style_desc: Create classic Pornhub-style logos, supports horizontal and vertical layouts with quick templates
dnd-alignment_desc: DND alignment grid generator, upload 9 images to create classic alignment comparison charts
mbti-grid_desc: MBTI personality image generator, select MBTI types and upload corresponding images to generate personalized personality display images
meme-slicer_desc: Meme slicing tool, upload images with custom rows and columns, batch export sliced images as ZIP
youtube-thumbnail_desc: YouTube video thumbnail downloader, get high-quality thumbnails from YouTube videos, supports multiple resolutions
all_tools_desc: Collection of all practical tools to boost your productivity
intro_title: Welcome to OumaShu - Your Ultimate Productivity Hub
intro_paragraph: OumaShu is a carefully curated directory of free online tools designed to boost your productivity and creativity. Whether you're looking for text processing tools, image editors, video converters, or entertainment apps, we've got you covered. All tools are hand-picked for quality, ease of use, and privacy protection.
intro_feature_free_desc: All tools are completely free to use with no hidden costs or subscriptions required.
intro_feature_privacy_desc: Most tools process data locally in your browser, ensuring your privacy and security.
intro_feature_noinstall_desc: Access all tools directly in your browser without downloading or installing anything.
